      @GetMapping @ResponseBody public Optional<User> getUser(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String authentication) throws InvalidTokenException
      Returns the user information of the sender.
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication header/JWT Token.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException

    • createOrUpdateUser

      @PutMapping @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode> createOrUpdateUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Updates a user with the user object in the request body or creates the user if the id does not exist.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to update.
      Returns:
      A JSON Object with the status code and the user id.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode> deleteUser(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String authentication, @RequestParam("id") Long id) throws InvalidTokenException
      Deletes a user if the current sender is the user to be deleted or has the privilege to delete users.
      Parameters:
      authentication - The authentication header/JWT Token.
      id - The id of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A JSON Object with the status code and message.
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException

    • createUser

      @PostMapping @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode> createUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Registers a new user and returns a JWT token
      Parameters:
      user - User object
      Returns:
      JSON String with status and JWT token
